title: Language is Magic - Part 1
description:
Shari and Michael talk about the idea that "Language is Magic" and plays a fundamental role in our role as humans as mediating between heaven and earth.  We talk about the ways that language can divide instead of bring together and how both of our personal stories deeply shape the way we think on this topic.  We're hopeful to make this an ongoing series and would welcome other people contributing their thoughts on the subject and joining in on the conversation.

Also, Shari recently stumbled across this short video (below) discussing the concept of creativity, and we both think this is a great summarization of some of what we're fumbling to dig into with this topic of language and the ways in which our small story gets interwoven into the larger story.

https://youtu.be/WRS9Gek4V5Q
